Platform Specific API

Files

file  bsp_platform.h
 Interface file to the platform specific functions abstraction APIs.

Macros

#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_DEFAULT   ((UInt32)0xFF)
 Defines SOC specific IO PAD Register configuration. More...
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_PULLUDENABLE_ENABLE   ((UInt32) 0x00U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for PULLUDENABLE field - Enables weak Pull Up/Down.
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_PULLUDENABLE_DISABLE   ((UInt32) 0x01U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for PULLUDENABLE field - Disables weak Pull Up/Down.
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_PULLTYPESELECT_DOWN   ((UInt32) 0x00U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for PULLTYPESELECT field - Pull Down is selected.
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_PULLTYPESELECT_UP   ((UInt32) 0x02U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for PULLTYPESELECT field - Pull Up is selected.
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_INPUTENABLE_OUT   ((UInt32) 0x00U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for INPUTENABLE field - Receive mode is disabled.
 
#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_INPUTENABLE_BI   ((UInt32) 0x04U)
 Defines IO PAD Register configuration for INPUTENABLE field - Receive mode is enabled.

Detailed Description

Macro Definition Documentation

#define BSP_PLATFORM_IOPAD_CFG_DEFAULT   ((UInt32)0xFF)

Defines SOC specific IO PAD Register configuration.

Defines Default IO PAD Register configuration except mux mode field - Disables weak Pull Up/Down, Pull Up is selected, Receive mode is enabled, Slow slew is selected

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum Bsp_PlatformClkSrc

Enum for the Venc's Clock Source Caution: Do not change the enum values. This is the same values as pmlibVideoPllClkSrc_t.

Enumerator
BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_PRCM_PER_PLL 

PER PLL

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO1_CLKOUT1 

Video1 PLL clkout1.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO1_CLKOUT2 

Video1 PLL clkout2.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO1_CLKOUT3 

Video1 PLL clkout3.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO1_CLKOUT4 

Video1 PLL clkout4.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO2_CLKOUT1 

Video2 PLL clkout1.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO2_CLKOUT2 

Video2 PLL clkout2.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO2_CLKOUT3 

Video2 PLL clkout3.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_VIDEO2_CLKOUT4 

Video2 PLL clkout4.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_HDMI 

HDMI PLL.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_ABE_GICLK 

ABE PLL.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DSS_GFCLK 

Functional Clock of DISPC.

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_DPLL_EVE_VID_DSP 

Common PLL for VID,EVE,DSP. Available only on Tda3xx platform .

BSP_PLATFORM_CLKSRC_MAX 

This should be last Enum.

Enumerator

Flag to indicate to the API to calculate the min M and min N

Flag to indicate to the API to calculate the max M and max N

Int32 Bsp_platformDeInit ( Ptr  args)

De-init the underlying platform.

Parameters
args[IN] Not used currently. Set to NULL.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.

Enables/Disables the HDMI PLL.

Parameters
enable[IN] TRUE/FALSE
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.

Function to get the name of the Core in printable string.

Returns

Int32 Bsp_platformInit ( const Bsp_PlatformInitParams *  initPrms)

Init the underlying platform.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] Platform Initialization parameters. If NULL is passed, pin mux setting will be done by default.
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.

inlinestatic

Returns
TRUE if the SOC is Omap5x derivatives else returns FALSE.

Int32 Bsp_platformLockRegion ( Bsp_PlatformMmrRegion  region)

This API will lock the five memory regions of CTRL_MODULE_CORE memory mapped space.

Parameters
regionMemory Mapped region Refer Bsp_PlatformMmrRegion for valid set of values
Returns
BSP_SOK
Int32 Bsp_platformSetDispcFuncClkSrc ( UInt32  fClkSrc)

Selects the Clock source for the DISPC Functional Clock.

Parameters
fClkSrc[IN] source of Functional clock, valid values Bsp_PlatformClkSrc.
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSetLcdClkPolarity ( UInt32  vencId,
UInt32  polarity 
)

Sets the DSS LCD clock to desired polarity.

Parameters
vencIdID of the LCD to be configured Refer Bsp_PlatformVenc for valid values. Only to be run for LCD
polarityThe polarity value to be set Refer Fvid2_Polarity for valid set of values
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate BSP error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSetLcdSyncPolarity ( UInt32  vencId,
UInt32  ctrlEnable,
UInt32  edgePolarity 
)

Sets the DSS LCD HSYNC/VSYNC edge polarity (rising/falling) with respect to pixel clock.

Parameters
vencIdID of the LCD to be configured Refer Bsp_PlatformVenc for valid values. Only to be run for LCD
ctrlEnableTRUE - HSYNC and VSYNC are driven according to edgePolarity FALSE - HSYNC and VSYNC are driven on opposite edges of pixel clock than pixel data
edgePolarityHSYNC and VSYNC to be driven on rising or falling edge of pixel clock if ctrlEnable is TRUE Refer Fvid2_EdgePolarity for valid set of values
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate BSP error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSetPinmuxRegs ( UInt32  mode_index,
UInt32  offset,
UInt32  pupd_info 
)

Configures IO pins needed for module.

Parameters
mode_indexMux mode to be cofigured
offsetoffset of the IO pin
pupd_infoIO pin configuration settings such as To enable Pull Up/Down, PullType Select, Receivemode is enabled / not, Slew control etc.,
Returns
BSP_SOK
Int32 Bsp_platformSetPllFreq ( const Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq *  pllFreq)

Configures the Pixel clock frequency.

Parameters
pllFreq[IN] Pointer to Bsp_PlatformSetPllFreq structure.
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSetVencClkSrc ( const Bsp_PlatformVencSrc *  vencPrms)

Selecte the Clock source for the Venc.

Parameters
vencPrms[IN] Pointer to Bsp_PlatformVencSrc structure.
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSetVipClkInversion ( UInt32  instId,
UInt32  invEnable 
)

Enable/disable VIP clock inversion at control module. Note: Applicable only for TDA2XX and TDA2EX.

Parameters
instIdVIP port ID to be configured
invEnableTRUE - Enable clock inversion FALSE - Disable clock inversion
Returns
BSP_SOK on success, else appropriate error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformSimVideoInputSelect ( UInt32  vipInstId,
UInt32  fileId,
UInt32  pixelClk 
)

Selects video port input file and pixel clock for simulator.

Parameters
vipInstId[IN] VIP instance ID
fileId[IN] File ID
pixelClk[IN] Pixel clock
Returns
FVID2_SOK on success, else appropriate FVID2 error code on failure.
Int32 Bsp_platformUnLockRegion ( Bsp_PlatformMmrRegion  region)

This API will unlock the five memory regions of CTRL_MODULE_CORE memory mapped space.

Parameters
regionMemory Mapped region Refer Bsp_PlatformMmrRegion for valid set of values
Returns
BSP_SOK

inlinestatic

Bsp_PlatformInitParams structure init function.

Parameters
initPrms[IN] Pointer to Bsp_PlatformInitParams structure.
